item.title: Coding
item.description: Languages I use [[Python]] is definitely the powerhouse I use most often, it is widely adopted in the visual effects industry, mainly due to the fact that it’s very easy to use and forces users to write clean and beautiful codes, sufficiently efficient for most jobs, and amazing range of libraries for all kinds of tasks.

item.title: Digital Garden
item.description: Digital Garden What exactly is digital gardening? If you don’t know what digital gardens are, just think of it as a personal Wikipedia, the end goal isn’t a perfectly written article, instead the process of slowly growing the interconnected knowledge is what digital gardening cares about.
